Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution due to gang threats in Argentina
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Recognition as Convention refugees or persons in need of protection

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Failure to rebut presumption of state protection
Crimes.Procedural_Stage: Judicial review of refugee claim determination
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Applicant's refusal to testify due to fear of gang retaliation

Crimes.Victim_Status: Individuals under threat for financial gain
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: Serious possibility of harm if returned

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Assessment of state protection adequacy in home country
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Claimants failed to report ongoing threats despite prior police intervention
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Testimonial and documentary evidence on police response
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to demonstrate lack of effective state protection
